amendment.description: To permit the painting to be placed in the Senate wing at a location determined by the Committee on Rules and Administration.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2221 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2221 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Lott. (consideration: CR S16054; text: CR S16054) To permit the painting to be placed in the Senate wing at a location determined by the Committee on Rules and Administration.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2221 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2221 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Lott.
